message: I'm pretty sure I'll be playing these games until well into 2012 and beyond.

So, just about the biggest flood of AAA games in recent memory is about to begin. Let's recap:

Deus Ex: Human Revolution - 23rd August

Dead Island - 6th September
Resistance 3 - 6th September
Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - 6th September
God of War: Origins Collection - 13th September
Rage - 13th September
Gears of War 3 - 20th September
Team Ico Collection - September (?)

Dark Souls - 4th October
Batman: Arkham City - 18th October
Ratchet & Clank: All 4 One - 18th October
Battlefield 3 - 25th October

Uncharted 3: Drake's Deception - 1st November
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 - 8th November
Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim - 11th November
Assassin's Creed: Revelations - 15th November
Saints Row: The Third - 15th November
Halo: Anniversary - 15th November
Metal Gear Solid: HD Collection - November (?)

Diablo 3 - Probably 2011
The Old Republic - Probably 2011
Dota 2 - Probably 2011
(I'm sorry if I forgot your most anticipated Nintendo and/or racing game. Feel free to add to the list.)
What're you buying?
Super Mario , Mario Kart 7, Starfox, F1 2011, Sonic Generations - I'm pretty much screwed as soon as Deus Ex launches
There are only about seven on that list I probably won't buy. I don't think it'd be humanly possible to finish the rest before the end of the year.

My Day Ones are: 
Deus Ex
Gears 3
Team ICO Collection
Dark Souls
Arkham City
Uncharted 3
Asselations
Halo

And for reasons I don't quite understand, I've been strangely excited for Skyrim, so I'll get that too. Rage too, probably.

MGS Collection and God of War Origins I'll also need to pick up asap, as those collections disappear from retail as soon as they're released.
I go back and forth on Skyrim. I'll probably pick it up against my better judgement.
I get panic attacks when I think about this list... Right now I'm taking a very short-term view of things, and I'm only focusing on Deus Ex. I'll cross the other bridges as they come...
The worst bit is that I can only really start any games at the end of September.  I lose any lead that the gap between DXHR and the rest would have given me. :(
That list is crazy. Gameageddon indeed.

My day one purchases would be:
Dark Souls
ICO Collection
MGS Collection

My "I'll get these, but not day one" list:
Uncharted 3
Arkham City

My maybe list:
Dead Islan
*sigh*
Three. :>
There is something very wrong with your 'My "I'll get these, but not day one" list'. Someone needs to be dropped on his head again.
Deus Ex Human Revolution in SIX DAYS!
YOU BASTARD!
More like -3 days.
God damn you.
@dawid22 Arkham City has the unfortunate handicap of being released in Dark Souls month. I'll have very little time for any other games during that period.

Weeeird.  My whole feeling/attitude at the moment is that the rest of 2011 is pretty quiet, and here you go with a Gameageddon.

And yet, despite making a pretty impressive list of games that many people would care about, you manage to leave out one of the three games I *am* actually excited about for the rest of the year.  Sulk.
Which is?
Interesting note: I saw our local game shops are listing the Team Ico Collection as well as Ico HD and SotC HD separately. However, the separate games only come in Japanese as far as I can tell.
@ZAnimus The omission ought to be glaring enough.  Sulk.
@Jevous From what I understand, they're only getting released separately in Japan.  So, yeah, that would make sense.
Oh yes, of course.
Which reminds me, I still need to go buy the particular peripheral I'll need to play that game :/
Oh, yes, I forgot it uses the thing.  Fortunately I got the thing when I bought that other thing that I never really played.
OK, Mr_V what games are omitted?
Thing.
That one where you have to overcome a series of obstacles.
The one we talked about at the last Rock Band party.
Check out the LINK Iori, it will give you some guidance
Bad news, Mr V. It has been delayed into next year: http://www.oxm.co.uk/32722/news/kinect-star-wars-delayed/
The stuff of legend, you might say.
Just like old times.
It's practically canon.

The one you just posted? Cheers. I'm so terribly sorry that I didn't somehow glean that V was referring Kinect Star Wars.

Christ sakes.

I've been part of this community for however long mostly because the level of conversation has been of such high quality about games. The amount of insight shared amongst members (notably MrG, Mr_V, Neilan and Buffel) has been, mostly, exceptional, and I've felt I've learnt something about our shared hobby.

That said, I have no interest in condescending assholes. Find another whipping boy, I'm done.
*violins*
This is truly a sad day. Anyone keen on some Dirt 3 tonight?
